resources.string: The en-/decrypted text will appear here
Enter the text, adjust the depth or enter the key and choose the encryption method and mode. Kryptomate will only change alphabetical letters (A-Z, a-z).

This app was created more for fun and I know it has limited use, nevertheless I found it surprisingly useful more than once.

 Feedback, especially bug reports and feature requests are very welcome.

 The whole source code of this program is available in my git repository at https://bitbucket.org/sjm/kryptomate . Feel free to fork it, change it and file pull requests :)
